channel.title: Steven Vance on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Steven Vance on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: People I saw or met in Chicago
item.description: Just a list, so I can't forget who I saw on a very good trip to Chicago last week. Megabus. Cheap and cheerful transportation, very convenient to where I was going, good drivers both ways. The return trip bus was kind of old (e.g. the power outlets didn't work) but the driver was fantastic. HI-Chicago a hostel in the loop. Cheap and cheerful lodging, very convenient. Eric Sinclair and Anne Zender.
